title: SVM Classifier on Iris Dataset
description: The iris dataset is a classic dataset used for classification problems. In this lab, we will learn how to plot different SVM classifiers in the iris dataset using Python scikit-learn. We will compare different linear SVM classifiers on a 2D projection of the iris dataset.
